## Constants

Precedence of operators

```go
const (
    LOWEST
    // =
    ASSIGN
    // == or !=
    EQUALS
    // < or >
    LESSGREATER
    // + or -
    SUM
    // * or /
    PRODUCT
    // -X or !X
    PREFIX
    // myFunction(X)
    CALL
)
```
